quick-start.title: Quick Start
quick-start.description: Discover how to get started with Remix PWA in a Remix project

v4.title: Ugrading to v4
v4.description: This documentation covers the process of upgrading to v4 from older versions of Remix PWA.

community.title: Community
community.description: At the core of Remix PWA lies a passionate community of developers dedicated to open-source collaboration, knowledge-sharing, and driving the evolution of PWA technologies.

technical-explanation.title: Technical Explanation
technical-explanation.description: Uncover the technical details and rationale behind Remix PWA's implementation, empowering you to leverage its full potential.

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.description: Stay up-to-date with the latest changes, enhancements, bug fixes and the behind-the-scenes progress and improvements in Remix PWA with the changelog.

default-fetch-handler.title: defaultFetchHander
default-fetch-handler.description: Your default handler for fetching requests in your Service Worker.

error-handler.title: errorHandler
error-handler.description: Your last defence against unhandled errors in your worker routes. Gracefully handle errors without breaking your Remix app.

get-load-context.title: getLoadContext
get-load-context.description: Global context object for the worker thread. Share data globally between your workers in your routes and the entry service worker.

worker-action.title: workerAction
worker-action.description: Route Worker API for intercepting and handling non-GET request within a route.

worker-loader.title: workerLoader
worker-loader.description: Worker route API for handling GET requests in the worker thread. Bring the power of Service Workers directly to your Remix routes.

manifest-link.title: ManifestLink
manifest-link.description: A quick component to link to a manifest file.

use-sw-effect.title: useSWEffect
use-sw-effect.description: React hook to facilitate worker messaging and notify Service Worker about location-based changes

use-badge-api.title: useBadgeApi
use-badge-api.description: A utility hook to interact with the Web Badging API, allowing you to set notification badges on your app.

use-battery-manager.title: useBatteryManager
use-battery-manager.description: The useBatteryManager hook to interact with the BatteryManager API.

use-network-connectivity.title: useNetworkConnectivity
use-network-connectivity.description: A utility hook for interacting with device network connectivity state.

use-pwa-manager.title: usePWAManager
use-pwa-manager.description: A utility hook to manage your PWA application as a whole.

defer.title: defer
defer.description: A utility to defer promises and stream responses to the client

json.title: json
json.description: A utility to create JSON responses from objects

redirect.title: redirect
redirect.description: A utility to send a redirect response to the client.
